text: Stop That Cab is a 1951 American comedy film directed by Eugenio de Liguoro. ==Cast== *Sid Melton as Sidney Gugenheimer *Iris Adrian as Lucy *Marjorie Lord as Mary Thomas *Tom Neal as Lefty ==External links== * *Stop That Cab at TCMDB *Stop That Cab at BFI Category:1951 films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Eugenio de Liguoro Category:1951 comedy films Category:Lippert Pictures films
title: Stop That Cab
